overview: Imagine this: Five showgirls shipwrecked with only each other for companionship. For warmth. For pleasure. No men. No skipper. No Gilligan. And of course, no Ginger, since she's making regular movies. Wait a minute. Stop. Why are you imagining this? Rent this tape. And see what happens.
tagline: Shipwrecked showgirls give in to their lesbian urges.
title: Where The Boys Aren't 2
